meanings.sent1: The school planned to renovate the playground over the next quinquennium.
meanings.sent2: She completed her quinquennium of service at the company and received a special award.
meanings.sent3: During the quinquennium, the town decided to host a big celebration every year.
meanings.sent4: The quinquennium felt like a marathon, with each year presenting new challenges.
meanings.sent5: The quinquennium passed by quickly, marked by the changing seasons.

meanings.definition: The fifth anniversary of a significant event.
meanings.sent1: Their wedding quinquennium was celebrated with a romantic trip.
meanings.sent2: The company commemorated its quinquennium with a grand party for all employees.
meanings.sent3: The quinquennium of the store opening brought back memories of the grand opening day.
meanings.sent4: The quinquennium of their friendship marked five years of laughter and shared experiences.
meanings.sent5: The quinquennium of the peace treaty was a time of reflection and hope for the future.
